meanings.sent1: The clubbers danced all night long.
meanings.sent2: The clubbers enjoyed the music at the nightclub.
meanings.sent3: The clubbers laughed and danced together.
meanings.sent4: The group of clubbers lit up the dance floor.
meanings.sent5: The clubbers' energy filled the nightclub with excitement.

meanings.definition: A group of people who go to nightclubs together.
meanings.sent1: We joined the clubbers for a fun night out.
meanings.sent2: The clubbers arrived in style at the nightclub.
meanings.sent3: The clubbers shared a taxi home after the party.
meanings.sent4: The group of clubbers stuck together like glue.
meanings.sent5: The clubbers' laughter echoed through the nightclub.
